title: The true copie of a letter sent from Sir Ralph Hopton, Col. Ashburnham, and Sir Iohn Berkley ; to Mr. Christopher Clarke, Major of the city of Excester [sic] for the laying down their armes, raysed for the Parliament, and the delivering up the city to the King : with the answer which the Major returned to them.
author: Hopton, Ralph Hopton, Baron, 1598-1652.
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
